component_text.text: Prove yourself as the Supreme Hunter among hunters. With your newfound power, no one will be able to challenge you!

There is no substitute for spoils and conquest, true. But there is something more - something which they cannot satisfy. A contest of strength, wit, tenacity and bravery where the winner becomes legend.
Hunt is on cooldown, as you've recently completed another one
Another hunt is currently active. You must complete or abandon it before proceeding with another.
The following [[col:red]]technology[[/col]] is required to unlock this entry:
Select a Lord to start the hunt. Afterwards, any of your other Lords can also participate in it.
